abstract: Globespan Capital Partners announced the closing of its fifth fund with commitments of $380 million on Monday. The closing of Globespan Capital Partners V gives the bicoastal venture firm $1.1 billion under management that it will deploy in communications, Internet infrastructure, enterprise software and storage systems and clean tech.
lead_paragraph: Globespan Capital Partners announced the closing of its fifth fund with commitments of $380 million on Monday. The closing of Globespan Capital Partners V gives the bicoastal venture firm $1.1 billion under management that it will deploy in communications, Internet infrastructure, enterprise software and storage systems and clean tech.
